name: Adombrali, the Unfathomable
text:
Incarnation W or R or U or G or B, W or R or U or G or B (You may banish any combination of two light, fire, water, wind or darkness resonators rather than pay this card's cost.)
When this card enters your field, if it was played by its Incarnation, for each different attribute among all banished resonators do the following:
W: Gain 400 life.
R: This card deals 400 damage to up to one target resonator.
U: Draw a card.
G: Produce W, R, U, G, or B.
B: Your opponent loses 400 life.
